subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: John Nicoletta, an extreme skier from Colorado, lost control when he tried to ski off a band of rock called the Headwall, tumbling to his death Friday in the Subaru Freeskiing World Championships at the Alyeska Ski Resort in Girdwood, Alaska. He was 27.
